feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening then changing to drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to periods of rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
